name: aid-locator
description: Aid Locator - A monorepo with Angular frontend and Spring Boot backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" --names "backend,frontend" --prefix name

author: Your Name
